text: Pilgrim is the 13th studio album by Eric Clapton. It was released on 10 March through Reprise Records and went to the top 10 in twenty-two countries including topping the album charts in Norway and Japan, making its most successful album for Clapton. It won a Grammy Award in 1999. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1998 albums Category:Eric Clapton albums Category:Reprise Records albums
title: Pilgrim (Eric Clapton album)
